thread.title: President Trump Calls Australia, Mexico and Germany on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: President Trump Calls Australia, Mexico and Germany on 'SNL'

title: President Trump Calls Australia, Mexico and Germany on 'SNL'
text:
President Trump Calls Australia, Mexico and Germany on 'SNL' 
"I haven't been briefed or anything, but what could go wrong?" NBC By Laurise McMillian Feb 5, 2017 In last night's SNL cold opening, Alec Baldwin portrays a bored Donald Trump who decides to call his fellow world leaders to "freak out" on them for no reason. Beck Bennett plays Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull, Alex Moffat plays Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto and German Chancellor Angela Merkel is played by Kate McKinnon. During the calls, a grim reaper-like Steven Bannon is there to egg him on the entire time. Watch the clip below.
